Node.definition: literally: to be wrong or bad (to someone); hence = state in which certain actions or patterns of behavior are considered bad or evil by (other) humans or deities, ► which often provokes them to anger
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= condition in which a person is angry or distressed about a particular situation
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker introducing a very humble request
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= action by which humans perform an event in haste before it can be prevented
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which deities are favorably disposed to someone, or of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people, and acting accordingly
= state in which deities feel compassion for humans, ► which is usually translated into action
literally: long of nostrils, long of breath; hence: = pertaining to not being given to anger
literally: long of nostrils; hence: = ability to restrain oneself from expressing one's displeasure; ≈ regarded as wisdom
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= process by which humans or animals stop living

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= plant, customarily identified with the castor oil plant but essentially unknown; quickly growing to some height; ► provides shade and protection against the sun

Node.gloss: to make to come up|to make grow
Node.definition: = causative process by which someone causes a plant,or part of a plant, to come up from the ground or to grow from a stalk
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= plant, customarily identified with the castor oil plant but essentially unknown; quickly growing to some height; ► provides shade and protection against the sun
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which an event has a high intensity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a general term for worms of all kinds; ≈ associated with uncleanness, decay, and insignificance
= process by which a certain moment in time arrives
= the day following the present day or another day in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= plant, customarily identified with the castor oil plant but essentially unknown; quickly growing to some height; ► provides shade and protection against the sun
= process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause
= process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
meaning unsure; possibly: = state of intense heat; ► resulting in suffering or burning

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= process by which humans or animals stop living

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= plant, customarily identified with the castor oil plant but essentially unknown; quickly growing to some height; ► provides shade and protection against the sun

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
literally: until death; hence: = state in which a certain emotion is felt with an extreme intensity
= process by which humans or animals stop living

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion
= plant, customarily identified with the castor oil plant but essentially unknown; quickly growing to some height; ► provides shade and protection against the sun
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to make grow|to bring up|to rear|to educate|to tend
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans take care of young plants or young humans while they undergo the natural development of increasing in size and changing physically on their way to being fully grown
= state of being associated with a certain time of day, ◄ referred to as a child of that time
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= state of being associated with a certain time of day, ◄ referred to as a child of that time
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion

= town; ◄ located in northern Mesopotamia near Mosul on the east bank of the Tigris (חִדֶּקֶל) ► built by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) after the flood (מַבּוּל) ancient capital of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) preached against by the prophet Jonah (יֹונָה)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= the side of the human body which is to the north when facing the direction of the rising sun; in extension: one option as opposed to another
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
